Instruction Manual

    Key Assignments
  • "c" Change Renderer
  • "x" Start/Stop Rotation animation
  • "w" Window 1 (Sphere)
  • "q" Window 2 (Pyramid)
  • "e" Window 3 (Cube)
  • "g" Game Window (TicTacToe)
  • "v" Video Window
  • "s" Squirrel
  • "z" resize game window (maximize/normal size)
  • "r" replay game
  • "1" tick TicTacToe Field 1 ("1" - "9" for each field tick)
    • Additionally, you can use your mouse to click on the objects and interact with them
    Change between renderers
    You can switch between the two renderers - Raytracer and Rasterizer - in the Renderer dropdown menu.

    Add light sources and objects
    You can add light sources by clicking on the "add lights" button. Set the position and color of the light and add it. In total, 8 lights are possible.
    Furthermore, you can add new objects to the scene. If you want to delete these objects later, just select it and press "delete object".

    Change phong parameters for individual objects
    To set lighting parameters for objects, just click the object and change the parameters in the menu on the left. To deselect, just click it again.
    Possible for: Windows, Window content objects, background, taskbar.

    Move camera
    If you want a different view, you can move the camera view around by using the sliders.

    Moving objects
    Application windows can be moved with the help of a driver animation. To do this, you need to select the object again and then you can move it using the arrow keys on the keyboard.

    TicTacToe
    Play a nice round of TicTacToe with a friend. Just open the game in the taskbar and tick the fields.
